item.title: Microsoft Teams Community Call - March 2021
item.description: Call summary This month’s community call featured latest look at the Teams Sample Repository (consolidated sample code Repo for Teams platform), then two Community Sample Showcase entries: Business to Citizen Consumer Communication Bot (allows citizen end-users with no Teams license to engage a business licensed user in a real-time Teams chat), and Bot Composer (create a simple bot, install it in Teams and have it calling the Graph in 15 minutes!
